statements: SELECT id, asset_name, quantity, market_value, risk_score FROM PortfolioHoldings;
SELECT asset_name, id, risk_score, quantity, market_value FROM PortfolioHoldings;
SELECT id, market_value, quantity, asset_name, risk_score FROM PortfolioHoldings;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, quantity FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE risk_score > 7.5;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, risk_score FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE risk_score < 4;
SELECT id, asset_name, market_value FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE market_value > 1000 AND risk_score > 3 ORDER BY risk_score ASC, market_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY asset_name;
SELECT id, quantity FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE quantity <= 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_holdings;
SELECT position_id, security_name, quantity, market_value FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT security_name, market_value FROM portfolio_holdings ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics;
SELECT position_id, sharpe_ratio FROM risk_metrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_holdings ORDER BY security_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT position_id, security_name, quantity FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE market_value > 10000
SELECT security_name, market_value FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY market_value DESC
SELECT position_id, volatility, sharpe_ratio FROM risk_metrics WHERE beta < 1.0
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM portfolios WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT user_id, name FROM portfolios ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM holdings WHERE price >= 100;
SELECT portfolio_id, volatility, max_drawdown FROM risk_metrics;
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, created_at FROM portfolios WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT asset_name, quantity, price, value FROM holdings WHERE portfolio_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT volatility, beta, sharpe_ratio FROM risk_metrics WHERE portfolio_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' ORDER BY sharpe_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM holdings WHERE value > 10000 AND price < 50 ORDER BY value DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM holdings ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, quantity FROM holdings WHERE id = 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, price FROM holdings WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM holdings WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks'
SELECT asset_name, quantity, price FROM holdings WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT portfolio_name, created_date FROM portfolio WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT position_name, position_type, quantity FROM positions ORDER BY position_type, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01'
SELECT asset_name, quantity FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE asset_type = 'equity';
SELECT id, market_value FROM portfolio_holdings ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE beta > 1.5;
SELECT portfolio_id, tracking_error FROM portfolio_performance WHERE expected_return < 0.05;
SELECT asset1_id, asset2_id, correlation FROM asset_correlations;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY market_value DESC
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, quantity FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE asset_type = 'equity' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY asset_name
SELECT portfolio_id, volatility, beta, sharpe_ratio FROM risk_metrics WHERE volatility > 0.1 ORDER BY sharpe_ratio DESC
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance WHERE max_drawdown < 0.05 ORDER BY expected_return DESC
SELECT portfolio_name, owner_name FROM portfolio_metadata WHERE creation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY portfolio_name ASC
